nna modɔɔ no na mefrɛɛ me ba fiir Egypt: mbrɛ wofii me nkyɛn kɔree nye no: wɔbɔɔ okum afɔr maa Baalim
"#Eks 4.22; Mat 2.15": na wɔhyeew eduhuam maa ehonyi a woegu."

"Ber a Israel yɛ abofra no: "Naaso emi na megyee Efraim taataa: mutuur hɔn me basa do; na bio
nna modɔɔ no na mefrɛɛ me ba fiir Egypt: woennhu dɛ emi na mesaa hɔn yarba."
ɔdɔ ntampehoma a: na meyɛɛ dɛ hɔn a woyi kɔndua fi adadaw do maa hɔn
"#Eks 4.22; Mat 2.15": na medze edziban sisii hɔn enyim."

"Ber a Israel yɛ abofra no: "Wɔbɛsan akɔ Egypt asaase do bio; na Asirianyi no bɛyɛ hɔn hen
nna modɔɔ no na mefrɛɛ me ba fiir Egypt: osiandɛ wɔpoow dɛ wɔbɛsan aba me nkyɛn."

"Ber a Israel yɛ abofra no: "Ekyir ara na me man pɛ dɛ ɔsan fi me nkyɛn kɔ: sɛ wɔfrɛ hɔn ɔsorsornyi no nkyɛn mpo a

nna modɔɔ no na mefrɛɛ me ba fiir Egypt: mebɛyɛ dɛn eyi wo ama? Israel
column5: ao? Mebɛyɛ dɛn mayɛ wo dɛ Adma? Mebɛyɛ dɛn koraa dze wo esi hɔ dɛ Zeboim? Ao
column6: m’akoma adan wɔ mo mu ae
column7: na m’ayamuhyehye abɔ mu redzɛw mo mu."

nna modɔɔ no na mefrɛɛ me ba fiir Egypt: merennsan mmbɛsɛɛ Efraim: osiandɛ meyɛ Onyame
"#Eks 4.22; Mat 2.15": na nnyɛ nyimpa; Krɔnkrɔnnyi a ɔwɔ wo finimfin: na merennhɛn kurow no mu."

nna modɔɔ no na mefrɛɛ me ba fiir Egypt: ɔno a ɔbɔpɔw dɛ gyata; na ɔnodze ɔbɔpɔw
"#Eks 4.22; Mat 2.15": na mbofra no dze ahopopo fi anee aba."

"Ber a Israel yɛ abofra no: "Wɔdze ahopopo fi Egypt bɛba dɛ anoma
nna modɔɔ no na mefrɛɛ me ba fiir Egypt: na woefi Asiria asaase do aba dɛ ebubur: na medze hɔn mama woetsim wɔ hɔn efi mu
na Israel fi dze ndaadaa etwa mo ho ehyia: naaso mbom Juda da ho dze Nyame dzi hen
"#Eks 4.22; Mat 2.15": na odzi nokwar ma Krɔnkrɔnnyi no."
